author: tabish
msg: Comment out some of the tests until a way to handle Socket accept timeouts is found.

author: tabish
msg: More work on adding new Socket tests, additional fixes to Socket connect to deal with timeout options for connect.  Removed some work in ServerSocket, APR can't seem to handle timeout on accept without the use of the polling mechanism which can't seem to be interrupted from another thread which can lead to segfaults in close operations if the accept hasn't timed out.
